articles.title: Nike confirms Deion Sanders is back in its family after relationship turned sour years ago
articles.description: Deion Sanders and Nike divorced many years ago, but the company confirmed Saturday to USA TODAY Sports they are now back in a relationship.
articles.content:
Deion Sanders and Nike are back together again after divorcing many years ago when their relationship turned sour and left him feeling unappreciated.
Nike confirmed the reunion Saturday in an email … [+3780 chars]
